course.title: CSI 2110 Data Structures and Algorithms (3 units)
course.desc: The concept of abstract data types. Simple methods of complexity analysis. Trees. The search problem: balanced trees, binary-trees, hashing. Sorting. Graphs and simple graph algorithms: traversal, minimum spanning tree. Strings and pattern matching.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, TutorialPrerequisites: ITI 1121, MAT 1348.
